des:
Linkplay Smart Thirdparty-Connect offers the most comprehensive voice controlled music play experience with Alexa. Control your Linkplay Smart Thirdparty-Connect Speaker hands free. Just say it, Linkplay SmartHome will obey. 

Here's a step by step guide:
(1). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "Linkplay Smart Thirdparty-Connect";
(2). Click Enable skill of "Linkplay Smart Thirdparty-Connect", then input your account username, password on the linking page;
(3). Talk to Echo“Alexa,discover devices.”. Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(4). Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

Here are the voice commands Smart Life has:

Speakers:
* Alexa, play music on livingroom speaker
* Alexa, next on livingroom speaker
* Alexa, turn up the volume by 20% on livingroom speaker
* Alexa, mute livingroom speaker
